name: ruby-spec-runner
description: Run specific rspec & minitest tests from within vscode

commands.title: Ruby Spec Runner: Run this spec/minitest file
Ruby Spec Runner: Run this line in rspec/minitest
Ruby Spec Runner: Debug this spec file
Ruby Spec Runner: Debug this line in rspec
Ruby Spec Runner: Re-run failed examples
Ruby Spec Runner: Clear test results for this file

ruby-spec-runner.rspecCommand.markdownDescription: Rspec: Provide an alternative rspec command. For example you may need to use a different path to rspec.

ruby-spec-runner.rspecEnv.markdownDescription: Rspec: Provide an environment variables for rspec command. For example you may to disable code coverage with something like `{"SKIP_COVERAGE": true}`.

ruby-spec-runner.rspecDebugEnv.markdownDescription:
Rspec: Provide additional environment variables for rspec command when debugging. For example you may to disable a spring preloader (which doesn't work with debugging) with something like `{"DISABLE_SPRING": true}`.

Environment variables set here will be merged with those set in `rspecEnv` with `rspecDebugEnv` variables given preference.

ruby-spec-runner.minitestCommand.markdownDescription: Minitest: Provide an alternative minitest command. For example you may need to use a different path to minitest.

ruby-spec-runner.minitestEnv.markdownDescription: Minitest: Provide an environment variables for minitest command. For example you may to disable code coverage with something like `{"SKIP_COVERAGE": true}`.

ruby-spec-runner.changeDirectoryToWorksp.description: Changes directory to workspace root before running the spec

ruby-spec-runner.projectPath.description: Absolute path to project directory (e.g. /home/me/project/sub-folder). Defaults to the workspace directory.

ruby-spec-runner.rspecFormat.markdownDescription:
Rspec: Output format for rspec.

- **Documentation:** group and example names
- **Progress:** dots for each example

ruby-spec-runner.saveBeforeRunning.description: Save the file before running the spec/test

ruby-spec-runner.rspecRunButton.description: Rspec: Show a status bar button to run the current spec file

ruby-spec-runner.rspecDebugButton.description: Rspec: Show a status bar button to debug the current spec file

ruby-spec-runner.rspecRunAllFailedButton.description: Rspec: Show a status bar button to re-run the failed examples for the current spec file

ruby-spec-runner.minitestRunButton.description: Minitest: Show a status bar button to run the current minitest file

ruby-spec-runner.rspecCodeLensPrompts.description: Rspec: Show code lens prompts to run specific examples or contexts in the editor

ruby-spec-runner.rspecCodeLensDebugPromp.description: Rspec: Show code lens prompts to debug specific examples or contexts in the editor

ruby-spec-runner.minitestCodeLensPrompts.description: Minitest: Show code lens prompts to run specific examples or contexts in the editor

ruby-spec-runner.rspecDecorateEditorWith.description: Rspec: Highlight errors, show spec results in the gutter, and highlighting in the overview ruler.

ruby-spec-runner.rspecDecorateEditorWith.markdownDescription: Rspec: Display stale results in the editor gutter and overview ruler. Disable to hide stale results. Only applies when `Rspec Decorate Editor With Results` is enabled.

ruby-spec-runner.minitestDecorateEditorW.markdownDescription:
Minitest: Highlight errors, show spec results in the gutter, and highlighting in the overview ruler.

**Windows users: turn this off if the minitest command is failing or check the spec runner windowsTerminalType configuration.**
Minitest: Display stale results in the editor gutter and overview ruler. Disable to hide stale results. Only applies when `Minitest Decorate Editor With Results` is enabled.

ruby-spec-runner.windowsTerminalType.markdownDescription: Select the vscode default terminal for windows machines. Affects the command used for minitest editor decoration.

ruby-spec-runner.overviewHighlightPositi.markdownDescription:
Select which side test results appear in the overview ruler. Can be useful if another extension uses a particular side of the overview ruler (eg git lens). Only applies when editor decorations are on.

_(Does not apply to line failures which are always full width)_

ruby-spec-runner.clearTerminalOnTestRun.markdownDescription:
Before a test command is executed the previous terminal output can be cleared. 

- **Clear:** Clear the terminal output
- **Do not clear:** Do not clear the terminal output (allow scrollback)

ruby-spec-runner.rubyDebugger.markdownDescription:
Which ruby debugger to use

* **Rdbg:** The [ruby debug vscode extension](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=KoichiSasada.vscode-rdbg)
* **RubyLSP:** The [ruby-lsp vscode extension](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Shopify.ruby-lsp)

ruby-spec-runner.rewriteTestPaths.markdownDescription: Rewrite paths in the test command. Useful for changing paths in the test command to match the environment the tests are run in (Docker etc). See the [the readme](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Fooo.ruby-spec-runner#rewriting-the-test-file-path) for more details.

exclusive.description: Stop looking for other matches after successfully applying this rule

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
